mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_tb (user_name, password, nickname, email, birth_date, tel, api_id, role_id) VALUES (#{userName}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{birthDate}, #{tel}, #{apiId}, #{roleId})
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) AS join_user_per_date, date_format(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS created_date FROM user_tb WHERE role_id = 1 GROUP BY created_date;
